title: Create TUI interface with Textual
description: Implement a text-based user interface for the task manager using the Textual library. Add 'ui' subcommand to task_manager.py that launches an interactive TUI for managing queues, tasks, and comments.

comments.text: Requirements: Add textual dependency to requirements.txt
Implementation: Add 'ui' subcommand to task_manager.py that launches interactive TUI
Features needed: Queue management (list, create), Task management (list, create, update, start, done), Task details view with comments, Comment management (add, remove)
Technical: Use Textual widgets for modern TUI experience, maintain all existing CLI functionality
Usage: Should work as './tm ui' or 'python task-manager/task_manager.py ui'
